name: Chelsey Gowac
intro: I started my Front End Engineer journey 11 months ago, learning HTML, CSS, Javascript, and React. I love the challenge, and I look forward to bringing my skills to a new team, and learning more about the web.

projects.name: Spotify Clone
projects.about: Created a Spotify clone using Create-React-App and Spotify API.

testimonials.value: I hired Chelsey for our front-end engineer position for her experience with React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. With her technical expertise and skillset, we were able to bring a product to market within just a few months. Chelsey can work quickly and effectively on her own in a fast-paced environment, with little oversight, all while producing quality code. I would be happy to work with her again on any project.
testimonials.name: Jeff Loiselle
